column11: 🧜‍♂️ Thank you for rescuing me. Please accept from us the Essence of Water. We hope that it will aid you in restoring *mojick* to the world.
🦌 I’m *free*. Thank you for making my nose glow again. I will once again take to the skies.
🐋 I can take a hint and *leave the bay* now. Maybe one day I will find my fountain of mojick and become the glorious *narwhal* once again.
